subtitle: A crisp pastry case filled with a delicious mixture of red onion, mushrooms, Mozzarella and fresh herbs then baked to perfection. Use ready-made pastry if short of time.

method.text: To make pastry: Sift flour into bowl and add butter. Rub in with fingertips until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Add cold water and fork through to make a firm dough. Roll out and use to line a 20 cm flan tin. Chill.
Heat oil and fry onion and garlic until soft. Add mushrooms and cook quickly for 5 min until all liquid has evaporated.
Spread mustard over base of flan. Mix together cheese, herbs and seasoning. Spoon half the mixture into the pastry case. Arrange mushrooms on top. Sprinkle over remaining cheese.
Bake in oven for 20 min until cheese has turned golden brown.

title: Mustard, Mozzarella and mushroom tart
